'''Saurian Claw Succulent''' is a [[Local Specialty]] that can be found in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Saurian Claw Succulents can be found across the [[Sulfurous Veins]] and [[Tepeacac Rise]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=613 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A succulent shaped like the paw of a great animal.<br>It is said that there was a time when the plants that grew here could shapeshift at will, almost as if they were some kind of enigmatic dragons. Some would appear poisonous or dangerous in other ways to avoid being eaten by herbivores. If this is indeed true, it is not hard to understand why the Saurian Claw Succulent &mdash; true to its name &mdash; came to take on the form it still has today.|[[Archive]]}}
